info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 02 at 4:52AM PDT by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN MORROW AND SOUTHWESTERN UMATILLA COUNTIES THROUGH 515 AM PDT... At 451 AM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Ukiah, or 36 miles southeast of Heppner, moving northwest at 40 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Ukiah and Dale. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. Persons in campgrounds should consider seeking sturdy shelter until this storm passes.
